text: Tracy Austin was the defending champion, but did not qualify this year. Martina Navratilova won the title by defeating Andrea Jaeger 6–3, 7–6(7–3) in the final. It was the 3rd Tour Finals title, 5th title of the year and 50th title overall for Navratilova in her career. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Round Robin=== ====Group A==== Q: qualifies to semifinals.
